thread.section_title: ShopTo.Net Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.shopto.net
thread.title: Stephen Butler

author: Stephen Butler
title: Stephen Butler
text: Have used ShopTo for many years for both games and hardware. Always speedy delivery and getting the item either on the day before or the day of release. Always have excellent prices and always cheaper than anywhere else online or in stores. Great customer services when they are needed. Would certainly recommend over other video game retail stores...like GAME for example!
